original: Ljungström, Johan Emil, bruksdisponent, Hävla, f. 5/8/69 i Marum, Ska-rab. 1., av Aug. Wiilh. L. o. Anna Johansson. G. 01 m. Anna Lindberg, d. 33. Barn: Karin f. 06. — Stud:ex. 87, prakt. o. tekn. stud. inom bergshantering 87-89. Anst. v. Laxå Bruk 89-97, v. x^xmar Jernverk 98-99, v. Finspongs Styckebruk 99, v. Eda Glasbruk 99-00, bruksförvalt. v. Häfla Bruk 00, disp. o. verkst. dir. f. Häfla Bruks A-B sed. 02. Led. av komm:nd, komm:fullm., skolråd o. tax:nd. RVO.
translated: Ljungström, Johan Emil, industrial manager, Hävla, b. 5/8/69 in Marum, Ska-rab. 1st son of Aug. Wiilh. L. and Anna Johansson. Ma. 01 m. Anna Lindberg, d. 33. Children: Karin b. 06. — Graduated from high school 87, practical and technical studies in mining 87-89. Employed at Laxå Bruk 89-97, at x^xmar Jernverk 98-99, at Finspongs Styckebruk 99, at Eda Glasbruk 99-00, estate management at Häfla Bruk 00, manager and executive director of Häfla Bruks A-B since 02. Member of the municipal council, municipal assembly, school board, and tax board. Awarded the Royal Order of Vasa (RVO).

education.credentialSubject: prakt. o. tekn. stud. inom bergshantering
